name: Diving Heroes
description:
Swim as far as you can and maybe you may get to the bottom.

Dive, cooperate, grapple gather, upgrade and repeat!

MOVEMENT (Left Analog Stick)

W > Up
A > Left
D > Right
S > Down

ACTIONS

Mouse  (Right Analog Stick) - Aim

Left Click (R2/RT) > Grapple objects and enemies.
Right Click (L2/LT) > Grapple your buddy and throw him deeper into the sea.
